players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Oh no, Bob is dead! We need to be careful and figure this out together."
Diana: "Charlie, I know you're the mafia. Bob is dead, and I investigated you last night. You're the only one left to eliminate."
You: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Charlie first night instead of someone more suspicious? That seems odd."
Diana: "Alice, I investigated Charlie because I had no information on anyone else. He's the mafia, and we need to vote him out."
You: "Diana, if you're the detective, why reveal your investigation so early? This feels like a mafia play to mislead us."
Charlie: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you wait until after Alice questioned you to claim it? That timing is very suspicious."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested
